Posts.Content: Hi im starting my 1st chemo Friday 20th ive read all side effects but interested in peoples experiences im having FEC for breast cancer ? Dreading it in one way but cant wait start treatment. Thanks  Jo
Posts.Title: *** November Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi i had my 1st one friday very apprehensive felt ok during the session and had nausea but tablets help with that but i got heartburn and indigestion so taken something for that bit of constipation so got senokat apart those very minor symptoms ive had a normal weekend i know itsxearly days so expecting some bad days too im taking a day at a time. good luck Iona  x Jo
Posts.Title: *** November Chemo Club ***
